tasks.label: Build & Publish SQL Server Project
tasks.command: dotnet clean ./Modules/Timesheet.Database/Timesheet.Database.sqlproj && dotnet build ./Modules/Timesheet.Database/Timesheet.Database.sqlproj /p:RunSqlCodeAnalysis=true /p:NetCoreBuild=true -v:detailed && dotnet publish ./Modules/Timesheet.Database/Timesheet.Database.sqlproj --no-build --output ./Modules/Timesheet.Database/publish/ -v:detailed
